name: Tournedos Rossini
recipeInstructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Season the filet mignon with salt, pepper, and a pinch of thyme. Sear it in an oven-safe skillet until browned on all sides.
Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook for 8-10 minutes or until the desired doneness is achieved. Remove from heat.
Meanwhile, toast the brioche slices and spread with seared foie gras. Drizzle with Madeira wine reduction.
Slice the filet mignon against the grain into thin strips and place on top of the toasted brioche slice.
Spread a layer of black truffle butter on top of the filet, followed by another slice of toasted brioche topped with seared foie gras.
Garnish with fresh thyme leaves and serve immediately.
description: A decadent Tournedos Rossini dish that combines the finest French ingredients in one exquisite meal. The filet mignon is paired with seared foie gras, Madeira wine reduction, and black truffle butter.
image: A beautifully plated Tournedos Rossini with a slice of filet mignon on top of toasted brioche topped with seared foie gras and black truffle butter.
